description: Lists the repositories in the added repositories list of the specified restriction type for a package group. For more information about restriction types and added repository lists, see Package group origin controls in the CodeArtifact User Guide.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain that contains the package group from which to list allowed repositories.

parameters.name: packageGroup
parameters.description: The pattern of the package group from which to list allowed repositories.

parameters.name: originRestrictionType
parameters.description: The origin configuration restriction type of which to list allowed repositories.

nested_items.name: allowedRepositories
nested_items.description: The list of allowed repositories for the package group and origin configuration restriction type.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. Use the value returned in the previous response in the next request to retrieve the next set of results.
